## ðŸŽ¯ Quick Start

```typescript
import DiscordNotifyFactory from 'discord-notify';

const notifier = DiscordNotifyFactory({
  webhookUrl: 'YOUR_DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL'
});

await notifier.success('Hello from Discord Notify!');
```
